name: Synthesizefortaranis
tagline: Text to voice synthesizer for making sounds to the Taranis
body:
Simple text to voice synthesizer for making custom sounds to the Taranis radio.

Requires .NET 4.5

Download the exe [here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B45P9uqTA1NuTWVfQkpBQmhzRDA/edit?usp=sharing)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
